AnalyserNode.summary: The AnalyserNode interface represents a node able to provide real-time frequency and time-domain analysis information. It is an that passes the audio stream unchanged from the input to the output, but allows you to take the generated data, process it, and create audio visualizations.

remarks.para: An AnalyserNode has exactly one input and one output. The node works even if the output is not connected.

para.see: Without modifying the audio stream, the node allows to get the frequency and time-domain data associated to it, using a FFT.
